a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Violent deaths in conflicts and one-sided violence vs. Terrorism deaths,
The concepts of 'Conflict' and 'Terrorism' employed by the two sources overlap considerably. Many, but not all, terrorism
deaths are also captured in the conflict deaths figures.
Violent deaths in conflicts and one-sided violence
Source: UCDP Georeferenced Event Dataset (GED) Global version 19.1 (2019), Conflict and Terrorism deaths - OWID based on IHME & GTD
